prompt: Photorealistic macro shot of a single, highly detailed antique button resting on a worn, dark wooden surface. The button is made of iridescent mother-of-pearl with intricate carvings, catching the light dramatically. Shallow depth of field, focusing sharply on the button's details, with the background softly blurred. Warm, golden-hour lighting creates a sense of age and value. Composition: Button positioned slightly off-center to the left, leaving ample negative space on the right for text overlay. Style: Highly detailed, realistic, antique. --ar 16:9
name: old-buttons-value-image-1.png

prompt: A wide, overhead shot of a velvet-lined display case filled with a diverse collection of antique buttons. The buttons are arranged in neat rows, showcasing a variety of materials (glass, metal, celluloid, shell) and designs. Soft, diffused lighting illuminates the buttons evenly, highlighting their colors and textures. The case is dark wood, providing a rich contrast. Composition: The case fills the frame horizontally, with the buttons forming a visually appealing pattern. Style: Clean, museum-quality display, photorealistic. --ar 16:9
name: old-buttons-value-image-2.png

prompt: A close-up, slightly angled shot of a hand holding a magnifying glass over a small group of antique metal buttons scattered on a piece of aged parchment paper. The magnifying glass focuses on one button in particular, revealing fine details and possibly a maker's mark. The parchment has faint writing and creases, adding to the antique aesthetic. Lighting: Dramatic side lighting, creating shadows and highlighting the texture of the buttons and paper. Composition: The hand and magnifying glass occupy the left third of the frame, with the buttons and parchment extending to the right. Style: Vintage, investigative, photorealistic. --ar 16:9
name: old-buttons-value-image-3.png

prompt: A wide shot of an antique button grading chart or identification guide, open on a rustic wooden table. Several loose antique buttons are scattered around the book, some partially obscuring the text and diagrams. The book is well-worn, with slightly yellowed pages. Natural light streams in from a window (out of frame), creating soft shadows and highlights. Composition: The book is centered horizontally, with the buttons arranged artfully around it. Style: Informative, educational, photorealistic, vintage. --ar 16:9
name: old-buttons-value-image-4.png

prompt: A still life composition featuring a small, antique wooden box overflowing with a jumble of colorful, vintage buttons. The box sits on a textured fabric surface (perhaps burlap or linen). A single, ornate button rests prominently on top of the pile. Warm, soft lighting emphasizes the colors and textures of the buttons and fabric. Composition: The box is positioned slightly off-center to the right, with the fabric extending to the edges of the frame. Style: Rustic, charming, photorealistic, vintage. --ar 16:9
name: old-buttons-value-image-5.png
